subject: THE DOCUMENATIONAL IS ATTACH BELOW REGARDS THE FUND TRANSFER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT
body:
FIRST ATLANTIC BANK 
Bank Address; Head Office,654 airport residential Accra Ghana 
Bank Email ; info@firstaltantic-bnk.com (mailto:info@firstaltantic-bnk.com) 
Bank Email ; firstatlanticbank255@gmail.com (mailto:firstatlanticbank255@gmail.com) 
Bank Tell Â ; +233531933310 Dear Sir 
We received your mail with thanks also our remittance department ask you for your information regards the bank transfer into your account, please you need to send your account information with your home address also phone number to reach you 
Please you must read the list of the documentation cover the fund and is attach below 
 
1) DEPOSIT CERTIFICATE 
2) BANK APPORTION FORM 
3) BANK ID CARD AND MY INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT 
4) LITTER YOUNG BOY PASSPORT 5) REFUGEE ID CARD 
6) STATEMENT OF ACCOUNT 
Please you must read them and make sure you fill out the bank form and send it back to us to enable our remittance department to transfer the funds into your account. 
Thanks 
we need your urgent response 
MR. YOBO MICHEAL 
DIRECTOR OF FIRST ATLANTIC BANK GHANA CUSTOMER CARE WHATSAPP ONLINE +233531933310 
FROM FIRST ATLANTIC BANK GHANA INTERNATIONAL MONETARY REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT (ACCRA GHANA ) 
This email message is confidential and for use by the addressee only. If the message is received by anyone other than the addressee, please delete it from your computer. First Atlantic Bank does not accept responsibility for changes made to this message after it was sent.Whilst all reasonable care has been taken to avoid the transmission of viruses, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that onward transmission, opening or use of this message and any attachments will not adversely affect its systems or data. No responsibility is accepted by First Atlantic Bank in this regard and the recipient should carry out such virus and other checks as it considers appropriate

subject: Re: THE DOCUMENATIONAL IS ATTACH BELOW REGARDS THE FUND TRANSFER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT
body:
Hello MR. YOBO MICHEAL,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your prompt response.

I understand that you need some details from me to proceed with the bank transfer. However, I am a bit confused about the list of documents you mentioned. Could you please explain what each document is for? 

Also, could you provide more information about the remittance department and how it works? I'm not very familiar with these banking terms and procedures.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Earl

subject: Re: THE DOCUMENATIONAL IS ATTACH BELOW REGARDS THE FUND TRANSFER INTO YOUR ACCOUNT
body:
Hello Mr. Yobo Micheal,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your prompt response.

I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the bank apportion form? What exactly does it entail? Also, could you clarify what is meant by "Litter Young Boy Passport Refugee ID Card"? 

I'm sorry for any inconvenience, but as I mentioned earlier, I am not comfortable sharing my personal details such as home address and phone number over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can proceed with this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Earl
